LanguageData.PowerConduit.label: Καλώδια ηλεκτρικού ρεύματος
LanguageData.PowerConduit_Blueprint.label: power conduit (blueprint)
LanguageData.PowerConduit_Frame.label: power conduit (building)
LanguageData.PowerConduit_Frame.description: A set of electrical cables for moving power around. Can be placed under walls and other buildings.
LanguageData.PowerSwitch.label: power switch
LanguageData.PowerSwitch_Blueprint.label: power switch (blueprint)
LanguageData.PowerSwitch_Frame.label: power switch (building)
LanguageData.WoodFiredGenerator.label: wood-fired generator
LanguageData.WoodFiredGenerator.description: Produces power by consuming wood fuel. Must be fueled by hand.
LanguageData.WoodFiredGenerator_Blueprint.label: wood-fired generator (blueprint)
LanguageData.WoodFiredGenerator_Frame.label: wood-fired generator (building)
LanguageData.WoodFiredGenerator_Frame.description: Produces power by consuming wood fuel. Must be fueled by hand.
LanguageData.ChemfuelPoweredGenerator.label: chemfuel powered generator
LanguageData.ChemfuelPoweredGenerator.description: Produces power by consuming chemfuel. Must be fueled by hand.
LanguageData.ChemfuelPoweredGenerator_Blueprint.label: chemfuel powered generator (blueprint)
LanguageData.ChemfuelPoweredGenerator_Frame.label: chemfuel powered generator (building)
LanguageData.ChemfuelPoweredGenerator_Frame.descripti: Produces power by consuming chemfuel. Must be fueled by hand.
LanguageData.Battery.label: Μπαταρία
LanguageData.Battery.description: Αποθηκέυει ενέργεια. ΠΡΟΣΟΧΗ - Οι φορτισμένες μπαταρίες μπορεί να εκραγούν αν βραχούν ή ζεσταθούν.
LanguageData.Battery_Blueprint.label: battery (blueprint)
LanguageData.Battery_Blueprint_Install.label: battery (blueprint)
LanguageData.Battery_Frame.label: battery (building)
LanguageData.Battery_Frame.description: Stores electricity when there is excess power and yields it when there is not. Warning - charged batteries tend to explode when exposed to rain or fire.
LanguageData.SolarGenerator.label: Ηλιακή γεννήτρια
LanguageData.SolarGenerator.description: Παράγει ηλεκτρισμό από το φως του ήλιου. Δεν λειτουργεί στο σκοτάδι.
LanguageData.SolarGenerator_Blueprint.label: solar generator (blueprint)
LanguageData.SolarGenerator_Frame.label: solar generator (building)
LanguageData.SolarGenerator_Frame.description: Produces electricity from sunlight. Does not work in the dark.
LanguageData.GeothermalGenerator.label: Γεοθερμική γεννήτρια
LanguageData.GeothermalGenerator.description: Παράγει ενέργεια από τον ατμό των θερμών πιδάκων. Πρέπει να τοποθετηθεί πάνω από έναν πίδακα.
LanguageData.GeothermalGenerator_Blueprint.label: geothermal generator (blueprint)
LanguageData.GeothermalGenerator_Frame.label: geothermal generator (building)
LanguageData.GeothermalGenerator_Frame.description: Produces electricity from geothermal steam geysers. Must be placed on a geyser.
